mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM LEDGER WHERE member_idx = #{member_idx}
SELECT to_char(writtendate,'YY/MM') "writtendate", sum(plusm) "plusM" FROM ledger where member_idx = #{member_idx} GROUP BY to_char(writtendate,'YY/MM')
SELECT to_char(writtendate,'YY/MM') "writtendate", sum(minusm) "minusM" FROM ledger where member_idx = #{member_idx} GROUP BY to_char(writtendate,'YY/MM')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ledger(ledger_idx, member_idx, item, plusM, minusM, writtendate) VALUES (ledger_seq.nextval, #{member_idx}, #{item}, #{plusM}, #{minusM}, sysdate)
